description.@en: It is of no great surprise that Soothsayers are well-paid for their auguries. More so than their Astrologer counterparts, they can factually draw prognostications using their Magick to produce desired, real results. Abnormally wealthy, Soothsayers are ostentatious in their affectations, mannerisms, and style of dress.

effect.@en: You must always purchase the highest quality trappings available. This includes foodstuffs, supplies, weapons, armor, and other wares.
